column4: hi, I open a file with .tex extension using firefox. When I click on the URL a window titled "Opening gant.tex" is shown. When I choose Browse... in that window I get the message: "The application you chose ("(null)") could not be found".
How do I tell firefox to open gedit instead?
right click link, hopefully you will see "open with" in context menu.
if not, save file to desktop or home folder, start gedit, and browse for file.
